meanings.definition: The act of throwing or casting over.
meanings.sent1: She performed the epibolies of the ball to her friend during the game.
meanings.sent2: The epibolies of the blanket over the bed kept her warm at night.
meanings.sent3: The magician's epibolies of the cape made it seem like he disappeared!
meanings.sent4: His epibolies of kindness over the situation brought peace to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The epibolies of paint on the canvas transformed it into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The process of adding or joining on.
meanings.sent1: The epibolies of new ingredients to the recipe made it even more delicious.
meanings.sent2: During the construction, the epibolies of extra bricks strengthened the wall.
meanings.sent3: The epibolies of extra toppings on the pizza made it a tower of flavors!
meanings.sent4: Her epibolies of creativity to the project brought a fresh perspective.
meanings.sent5: The epibolies of teamwork to the group effort led to great success.

meanings.definition: A layer or covering that is added on top.
meanings.sent1: The epibolies of frosting on the cake made it look irresistible.
meanings.sent2: The epibolies of snow on the trees created a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent3: The epibolies of whipped cream on the dessert made it even more decadent.
meanings.sent4: The epibolies of stars in the night sky twinkled brightly above.
meanings.sent5: The epibolies of leaves on the ground signaled the arrival of autumn.
